resources.string: Let\'s test your world knowledge. Are you ready?
1. Which country\'s population is expected to decline between now and 2050?
2. Our planet is overshoot. It would take 1.5 earths to sustain our current population. How many earths would it take by 2050 if current resource consumption trends continue?
3. What would world population be by 2100 if the global fertility rate remained at its current rate (2.5 children average)?
4. What can be done to help preserve the environment for future populations?(Select all that apply.)
Spend water and other resources like there\'s no tomorrow.
Keep devices plugged all the time.
Boycott companies which are not sustainable.
